name: Parkour and shoot
description:
Controls are WASD to move, space to jump. Space twice to double jump, shift to dash, ctrl to stop time, 1, 2, 3 to switch weapons, go to settings and off or on motion blur accrding to what you like, left click to shoot. You can wallrun by touching walls while in the air. Jump, move away from the wall, or stop moving to stop wallrunning. Mouse to aim, left click to shoot, R key to reload. Press P to respawn if you fall off the map or something and ESC to go back to main menu and F to punch. right click to shoot rocket that can take you in the air or can kill enemies. you can go to arena to fight enemies or can do parkour training too. Good luck :)

And Ya pls check my channel and subscribe-

The Coding Expert - YouTube
